title: DividendCompositionEnum
description: The enumerated values to specify how the composition of Dividends is to be determined.

oneOf.title: CalculationAgentElection
oneOf.description: The Calculation Agent determines the composition of dividends (subject to conditions).

oneOf.title: EquityAmountReceiverElection
oneOf.description: The Equity Amount Receiver determines the composition of dividends (subject to conditions).
